package:
msfm3d 0.1.0version
This package subscribes to a robot pose and map (Octomap or Voxblox ESDF/TSDF) and outputs a frontier PointCloud, a goal pose, and a path to that pose.
Andrew B Mills
https://github.com/andrewbmills/marble-frontier Andrew B Mills TODO
